Rooms & Suites

Comfortable rooms that make business sense

The hotel features 118 business suites amongst its 168 rooms. Spacious, comfortable and elegantly appointed, each is thoughtfully designed to allow the crucial work-life balance a business executive seeks.

From plush and comfortable bedding, televisions and Wi-Fi connectivity to a lavish marble bathroom, there’s everything you will need to breeze through your day. You can also work in the comfort of your room with a spacious work desk and the latest business technology.
